setting.time: 1930s Moscow, twilight, several days after learning of writer's fate
setting.location: Alexander Garden near Kremlin walls, secluded park area
setting.weather: Cool evening with deep shadows from surrounding trees

characters.appearance: Elegant woman, early 30s, beautiful features, now showing signs of distress, haunted expression
characters.clothing: Dark coat over simple dress, hair less perfectly styled, hands ungloved
characters.position: Standing beside ornate park bench, looking toward distant lights
characters.action: Clutching small object in hands, speaking aloud to empty air

characters.appearance: Strange man, appears suddenly, tall and lean with unusual features
characters.clothing: Dark formal clothing, appears well-dressed but somehow unsettling
characters.position: Emerging from shadows between trees, approaching cautiously
characters.action: Walking toward woman with measured steps, extending one hand in greeting

scene.mainElements: Moscow park setting with ornate benches, mature trees, decorative lampposts beginning to glow
scene.details: Wrought iron park furniture, gravel pathways, fallen autumn leaves scattered on ground, distant glow from Kremlin lights, ornate lamp posts casting pools of warm light, shadows deepening between trees
scene.background: Kremlin walls visible through trees, distant Moscow buildings with lit windows, other park paths empty in evening hour
scene.atmosphere: Moment of fateful decision in gathering darkness, desperation meeting opportunity, beautiful park setting becoming stage for supernatural encounter, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot capturing both figures with park and city backdrop
composition.focus: Woman's desperate expression as mysterious figure approaches
composition.depth: Foreground: park bench and scattered autumn leaves; middle ground: two figures meeting in twilight; background: Kremlin walls and illuminated Moscow cityscape

colorPalette.usageNotes: Soft, dreamy colors that blend into each other

rendering.detailLevel: selective focus, some areas sharp, others dissolving
